medical_history.chief_complaint: Increased facial and body hair growth and frontal hair loss.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with increased body hair and frontal hair loss with symptoms progressively worsening over 8 years for one patient and for other patients over 3-5 years. Symptoms included hirsutism and alopecia, with varying intensities in hair loss.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of infertility, polycystic ovarian syndrome, hypertension, maturity-onset diabetes, and dyspepsia.
medical_history.family_history: Patient 4 has a family history of hair thinning and male pattern hair loss.
